t: Amazon.com: MINUT
s: An all-in-one smart home alarm designed to blend in to your home, easy-to-install, packed full of sensors, and can instantly alert you to threats in your home

t: Amazon.com: Minut - Noise, Occupancy, Motion and Temperature Monitoring for Vacation Rentals (Airbnb, VRBO & Serviced Apartments) : Electronics
s: The privacy-safe wireless home sensor monitors noise, motion, temperature and humidity levels in your home, in addition to having a built in security alarm. Connected with the easy-to use Minut app, you will receive insights and notifications about loud sound, fires and potential intruders.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
